Row.Text: Republic of Pirates Unique Production Building. +5[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Military Buildings, Gold Buildings, and Wonders. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast. Has no [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold maintenance.
Must be placed on Coast.[n]Republic of Pirates Unique Building.
Republic of Pirates Unique Gold Building. +4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Resources and Wonders. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast.
Must be placed on Coast.[n]Republic of Pirates Unique Building.

Republic of Pirates Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Naval Station and Naval Arsenal in the same District. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Resource in your Pool. Friendly Naval Units receive +50 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing in this tile.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Resource in your Pool. Friendly Naval Units receive +50 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing in this tile.

+3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. This Settlement generates [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys worth 3 Treasure Fleet points in the Exploration Age. +1 [icon:ATTRIBUTE_ECONOMIC] Economic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be built in Distant Lands Coast adjacent to Land that is not a Lake.

This Settlement generates [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys worth 3 Treasure Fleet points in the Exploration Age. +1 [icon:ATTRIBUTE_ECONOMIC] Economic Attribute Point.[N]Must be built in Distant Lands Coast adjacent to Land that is not a Lake.
In the immediate nearness of the gold, all else had been forgotten.
